item.title: Proactive or Reactive
item.description: Just a few things I read this a couple of days ago about reactive/proactive: “Our behaviour is a function of our decisions, not our conditions”. If we choose to blame others for our conditions, we become reactive. “Proactive people are driven by values - carefully thought about, selected and internationalised values” while “Reactive people are driven by feelings, by circumstances, by conditions, by their environment”. Reactive language: * There's nothing I can do.
